mapper.select: select no, subject, userid, hit, to_char(writedate, 'MM-DD HH:MI') writedate from freeBoard order by no desc
select no, subject, content, userid, hit, writedate from freeBoard where no=#{param1}
mapper.update: update freeBoard set hit=hit+1 where no=#{param1}
mapper.insert: insert into freeBoard(no, subject, content, userid, hit, writedate, ip) values(freeboard_sq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{userid}, 0, sysdate, #{ip})
